#include<iostream>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;



int main()
{
   unsigned long long int t,i,j,n,m,ans;
    cin>>t;
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        ans=1;
        for(j=n-m+1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            ans=(ans*j)%mod;
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
